metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart and the player go skinnydipping at a quiet cove near Baldur's Gate sometime after SH becomes an enemy of Shar. In this scene, Shadowheart is feeling vulnerable after having been abandoned by her goddess, and seeks a moment of catharsis with the player - she had previously shared with them that she didn't know how to swim, and now wishes to reclaim a bit of herself after her identity as a shar follower is lost.She and the player bond and a playful, tender romance scene ensues after the return to shore.Marking for rerecord for a more playful, teasing tone, less serious than the origial recordings.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Open origin debug book2. Select Nights3. Select "Act 3 Romance - Enemy of Shar Path"4. Talk to Shadowheart5. Agree to go with her

17.speaker: Shadowheart
17.text: This will do. Take off your clothes.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart and the player have reached a small quiet cove not far from Baldur's Gate, SH looks around approvingly.NodeContext: Trying to be airy, casual

90.speaker: Shadowheart
90.text: You don't want to get them wet, do you? Or worse, weigh you down. Go on; don't turn shy on me now.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I never said I was coming in with you.

32.speaker: Shadowheart
32.text: Well you can't be of much help to me from the shoreline, can you? Shouting moral support while I drown?

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I didn't bring anything to swim in.

63.speaker: Shadowheart
63.text: Come on then. We've already come this far.
63.context: NodeContext: Sliver of nervousness. Encouraging herself as much as the player

77.speaker: Shadowheart
77.text: Fine. Well don't just stand there, turn around.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their back to SH as she begins to undress off-screenNodeContext: Playfuly pleading modesty

16.speaker: Shadowheart
16.text: You haven't even attempted to peek. I'm a little offended.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera holds on player. SH (offscreen) calls to the player while their back is still turnedNodeContext: Light/Joke-offended

93.speaker: Player
93.text: What can I say? I'm respectful.

49.speaker: Shadowheart
49.text: That's one word for it, I suppose. You can turn around again.

51.speaker: Shadowheart
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps foward, nude. Off the player's look, she appears slightly apprehensive as she speaks.NodeContext: A little vulnerable (nude in front of the player for the first time)

10.speaker: Shadowheart
10.text: Don't just stare while you're still dressed, I mean. Come on, I kept up my end of the bargain - will you keep up yours?
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sassy smile to conceal vulnerabilityNodeContext: Weaponized sass & inuendo to shield vulnerability

31.speaker: Shadowheart
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH gives a cheeky smile. The player shrugs and reaches to take their clothing off.  Camera holds on Shadowheart, watching. Maybe her eyes widen a little. Brief fade down.NodeContext: Playful/cheeky. Watching the player undress

15.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH gives a cheeky smile. The player shrugs and reaches to take their clothing off.  Camera holds on Shadowheart, watching. Maybe her eyes widen a little. Brief fade down.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Actually, I've changed my mind. I'm heading back to camp.

104.speaker: Shadowheart
104.text: You're what...? But I already took my clothes off.

29.speaker: Shadowheart
29.text: Now come on, get those clothes off. You've made me wait long enough.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player starts to disrobe. Camera holds on Shadowheart, watching. Maybe her eyes widen a little. Brief fade downNodeContext: Eager

75.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Shadowheart both stand at the shoreline, undressed and facing the water. Shadowheart turns. Time cut to the player and Shadowheart both standing at the shoreline, undressed and facing the water. Shadowheart turns to the player.

21.speaker: Shadowheart
21.text: I... I don't know if I can do this. Now that I'm here.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Use scene cameras to account for different Scene Stage possibilities, the player could be in the water already on the Streaming Safe version of the scene.NodeContext: Sudden bout of cold feet. Looking for reassurance

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Yes you can. Just walk forward until you feel the weight lift.

57.speaker: Shadowheart
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, Shadowheart walks forward out of frame. The player follows.NodeContext: Deep breath, building her nerve

27.speaker: Player
27.text: All the things we've faced, and you're afraid of getting a little wet?

69.speaker: Shadowheart
69.text: More the drowning, and the things that could be hiding underwater, and the drowning, and the cold. Did I mention the drowning?

36.speaker: Shadowheart
36.text: Let's get on with it, before I lose my nerve.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, Shadowheart walks forward out of frame. The player follows.NodeContext: Deep breath, building her nerve

66.speaker: Player
66.text: We don't have to do this if you're not ready.

92.speaker: Shadowheart
92.text: Wait - just give me a moment. I can manage. As long as you stay with me.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Deep breath to steel her nerves after 'wait'. After her line, Shadowheart walks forward out of frame. The player follows.NodeContext: Deep breath to steel her nerves after 'wait'.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Shrug and run in ahead of her.

30.speaker: Shadowheart
30.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player dashes out of frame towards the water. After a brief hesitation, she follows.

Choice shouldn't be available if player chose DO AS SHE SAYS in Streaming Safe branchNodeContext: Surprised. The player has rushed into water to go skinnydipping, leaving her to follow

95.speaker: Shadowheart
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Shadowheart tread water near one another, NodeContext: Shocked by cold water

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: she delivers her line, wry look on her face then splashs the player and moves toward them as the camera tilts to the moon overhead.NodeContext: playful, Breathless from cold water

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: Thank you. I needed that. I needed to know I can face things without Shar.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Later, the player and Shadowheart are sitting side by side at the shore post-swim. Still undressed (if Streaming Safe isn't engaged).NodeContext: Grateful, sincere. Going swimming has proven to be cathartic

59.speaker: Shadowheart
59.text: I don't want to go back. Not just yet.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH leans in closer to the player, looking at them intently.NodeContext: Longing, romantic

9.speaker: Shadowheart
9.text: I'd drag you into the sand if I thought I'd survive it. Then again, I suppose I can think of worse ways to die.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Both still sitting on the beach. Player is to Shadowheart's right. Shadowheart is on her right side leaning back on her right arm

79.speaker: Shadowheart
79.text: How about a night on the beach, under the stars? Together. Just near enough.
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Both still sitting on beach.The camera leaves them be, panning away to the shore. But no touch between them two.

84.speaker: Shadowheart
84.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She kisses the player softly, then hungrily.

She lowers herself to the sand, the player following. They embrace, the player on top of Shadowheart. She suddenly utters a small gasp of pain - 

SH squirms slightly to move off an offscreen pebble poking into her.NodeContext: Include small gasp of pain

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She kisses the player softly, then hungrily.

She lowers herself to the sand, the player following. They embrace, the player on top of Shadowheart. She suddenly utters a small gasp of pain - 

SH squirms slightly to move off an offscreen pebble poking into her.NodeContext: Include small gasp of pain

48.speaker: Shadowheart
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: She pulls the player in closer. They kiss.NodeContext: Passionate

18.speaker: Shadowheart
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: She pulls the player in closer. They kiss.NodeContext: Passionate

112.context: CinematicNodeContext: The camera leaves them be, panning away to the shore. Design shot to work for both Explicit and Streaming Safe Modes.

113.speaker: Shadowheart
113.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She kisses the player softly, then hungrily.

She lowers herself to the sand, the player following. They embrace, the player on top of Shadowheart. She suddenly utters a small gasp of pain - 

SH squirms slightly to move off an offscreen pebble poking into her.NodeContext: Include small gasp of pain

114.speaker: Player
114.text: And you can put them back on again if you like. Come on, we've a walk ahead of us.

37.speaker: Shadowheart
37.text: Yes. A silent one, if you have any sense.

55.speaker: Shadowheart
55.text: You're lucky I didn't have anything more dangerous to throw than undergarments.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns to peek, only to duck a balled item of clothing flung at them.

13.speaker: Shadowheart
13.text: Fine. Well don't just stand there, turn around.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their back to SH as she begins to undress off-screenNodeContext: Playfuly pleading modesty

41.speaker: Shadowheart
41.text: You haven't even attempted to peek. I'm a little offended.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera holds on player. SH (offscreen) calls to the player while their back is still turnedNodeContext: Light/Joke-offended

25.speaker: Shadowheart
25.context: NodeContext: pleased with herself. Got undressed while the player was facing away/undressing themselves

76.speaker: Shadowheart
76.context: NodeContext: A little vulnerable (nude in front of the player for the first time)

99.speaker: Shadowheart
99.text: I know. But it's nice to hear you say it.
99.context: NodeContext: Masking relief with a airy confidence

38.speaker: Shadowheart
38.text: We'd better get warmed up then. Come on.

105.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns away from Shadowheart and reaches to undress. The screen fades to black for a brief time passage-of-time cut. It comes back to playe nude, having left their clothing on the sand. They turn back to Shadowheart - who steps forward, already nude.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: There's easier ways to get me naked, you know.

62.speaker: Shadowheart
62.text: I don't doubt you in the slightest.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Coy smileNodeContext: Gently teasing

20.speaker: Shadowheart
20.text: This will do. Get in the water.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart and the player have reached a small quiet cove not far from Baldur's Gate, SH looks around approvingly.NodeContext: Trying to be airy, casual

46.speaker: Shadowheart
46.text: Go on, you're not afraid of getting a little wet, are you?

70.speaker: Player
70.text: I never said I was coming in with you.

50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart shrugs in a 'have it your way' gesture, then moves to undress. The player smiles, then follows suit - no nudity shown. Cut to them inside the water, obscuring their bodies.

58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart shrugs in a 'have it your way' gesture, then moves to undress. The player smiles, then follows suit - no nudity shown. Cut to them inside the water, obscuring their bodies.

8.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player moves to undress. Shadowheart smiles, then follows suit - no nudity shown. Cut to them inside the water, obscuring their bodies.

23.speaker: Shadowheart
23.text: My feet aren't touching the bottom anymore - it's terrifying. Do people really enjoy this?
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: shadowheart and player are paddling in water, hiding their nudity beneath the water, face to faceNodeContext: Mild alarm as she learns to swim

43.speaker: Player
43.text: You can hold onto me if you're afraid.

56.speaker: Shadowheart
56.text: You know you didn't need to wait until I was in the water to hold me.

89.speaker: Shadowheart
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: she delivers her line, wry look on her face then splashs the player and moves toward them as the camera tilts to the moon overhead.

71.speaker: Shadowheart
71.text: Thank you. I needed that. I needed to know I can face things without Shar.
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Later, the player and Shadowheart are sitting side by side at the shore post-swim. Dressed.NodeContext: Grateful, sincere. Going swimming has proven to be cathartic

102.speaker: Shadowheart
102.text: I don't want to go back. Not just yet.
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH leans in closer to the player, looking at them intently.NodeContext: Longing, romantic

35.context: CinematicNodeContext: She pulls the player in closer. They kiss.NodeContext: passionate

78.speaker: Player
78.text: All the things we've faced, and you're afraid of getting a little wet?

64.speaker: Shadowheart
64.text: More the drowning, and the things that could be hiding underwater, and the drowning, and the cold. Did I mention the drowning?

53.speaker: Player
53.text: We can go back to shore if you're uncomfortable.

74.speaker: Shadowheart
74.text: Wait - just give me a moment. I can manage. As long as you stay with me.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: treading water, takes a deep breath to steel herselfNodeContext: Building her nerve

106.speaker: Shadowheart
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: being splashed softly by player, feigns outrageNodeContext: Mock outrage

54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player moves to undress. Shadowheart smiles, then follows suit - no nudity shown. Cut to them inside the water, obscuring their bodies.

100.text: I didn't bring anything to swim in.
